name: places/ChIJ-T6V1xlZwokR1PslLH7axQU
adrFormatAddress: 880 5th Ave, New York, NY 10021-5260, USA

originalText.text:
Dr. Michael Scoma, MD, is an absolute gem of an Infectious Disease Physician. Why can't we find more like Dr. Scoma in this country?

Dr. Scoma should be the gold standard in every doctor-patient relationship and yet this standard is absolutely rare to virtually not existent. I was looking for a competent physician in the area of a knowledge-user in evidence; ability to tailor my care when needed; willingness to learn, if needed, because an infection type is rare and if a standard treatment just wasn't working for me and required tailoring; kindness; and to have a physician - patient relationship where I feel more than comfortable to be honest about my health. Also, a doctor who didn't shy away from a person with other health conditions that needs to be integrated in an acute illness and viewed health through the lens of the entire person meaning looking at the situation bio-physiologically, situationally, and within the context of the environment we live in, and one that I have to mitigate.

I was referred to Dr. Scoma by a very smart professional registered nurse and clinical scientist who is very familiar with difficult to treat and life-threatening infections, stealth infections. I was thrilled to find Dr. Scoma, the rare gem of a physician, who is just absolutely amazing exceeding all my wishes in an Infectious Disease Physician and more. This is coming from a nurse of almost 39 years and this doctor really knows how to help people with stealth infections as he listens to me and listens to information I bring him from PUBMed and takes my reports of symptom(s) seriously. While I have my appointments by televideo, half the country away, I feel like I am right there in his office because his presence of clear expertise and time and being a real person and love for helping and caring for his patients is very strong.

Thank you, Dr. Scoma, and I sure hope this review doesn't make you too busy because I know I will always need you to care for my health concern and for all the above, I am so grateful!

Sincerely,
Amy
